basics.name: Imad Ud Din Khan
basics.label: Full Stack Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced Full Stack Engineer currently working at HALA, specializing in .NET Core, Angular, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB. With over 5 years of experience in software development, I have expertise in building scalable microservices, mobile applications with Flutter, and enterprise web solutions. My technical stack includes ASP.NET Web API, Angular frontend development, and modern DevOps practices. I have contributed to obtaining regulatory approvals for fintech solutions and have a proven track record of delivering robust applications across mobile and web platforms.

work.description: Fintech company providing innovative financial solutions
work.summary: Developing full-stack solutions using modern technologies including ASP.NET Web API, .NET Core, Angular, and Microservices architecture.
highlights: Developed and maintained web applications using ASP.NET Web API and .NET Core
Built responsive frontend applications with Angular framework
Designed and implemented microservices architecture for scalable solutions
Contributed to obtaining SAMA license for Hala Financing Company
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions

work.summary: Responsible for developing mobile application UI from given designs and integrating with Firebase/Firestore Database.
highlights: Developed mobile application UI from given designs using Flutter
Connected designed UI with Firebase/Firestore Database
Worked with Flutter, Firebase, Firestore, and GitHub

work.summary: Eartheme mobile app helps buyers and purchasers find desirable properties on maps and communicate with sellers (Dealers/Owners).
highlights: UI/UX finalization and implementation in Flutter
Created web APIs in .NET Core 3.1 with EF Core and MSSQL/MongoDB
Implemented CI/CD using GitLab and Docker on Linux server
Worked with Flutter, .NET Core WebAPIs, MongoDB/MSSQL, RabbitMQ, Docker, GitLab

work.summary: Worked as an intern web developer focusing on designing, implementing, and monitoring web pages and sites.
highlights: Designed, implemented, and monitored web pages and sites
Collaborated with other developers to identify software errors and insufficiencies
Worked on stored procedures in SQL Server
Created ASP.NET Core Web API tutorials for beginners

work.description: IBMS - Hotel Management System (Final Year Project)
work.summary: Developed online hotel management web application under university advisor supervision to resolve hotel booking and reservation problems.
highlights: Developed hotel management web app using PHP, phpMyAdmin, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap
Worked in a team under university advisor supervision
Focused on resolving hotel booking and reservation problems
Improved hotel management efficiency through web-based solutions

volunteer.summary: Helped family members learn programming basics and solve technical problems.
highlights: Taught basic programming concepts
Assisted with debugging and problem solving
Provided guidance on learning resources
Full stack development mentoring
Software development life cycle understanding

awards.title: Recognition for contribution in obtaining SAMA license for Hala Financing Company
awards.summary: Recognized for technical contributions that helped HALA successfully obtain regulatory approval from Saudi Arabian Monetary Authority (SAMA) for financing operations.

references.name: Omar Alajaji
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Imad, his performance working as a Software Engineer at Hala Financing Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.

projects.name: Eartheme Real Estate
projects.description: Mobile and web platform for property listings and management
highlights: Developed full-stack solution with Flutter mobile app
Created RESTful APIs with .NET Core
Implemented real-time messaging system
Integrated Google Maps for property location visualization
Set up API Gateway using Ocelot for request routing and load balancing
Deployed application using GitLab CI/CD pipeline with Nginx reverse proxy
